home.parrafo-info: Software engineering student, with an emphasis in web development.

sobre-mi.title: About me
sobre-mi.texto_sobreMi: I am a software engineering student, who has a technologist in analysis and development of information systems, I have experience in web development based on sharepoint, using automation tools such as power automate, in order to automate processes business that have been occurring repetitively within the company.   I am an empathetic and enthusiastic person, I like to face the challenges that come in the best way, both in my personal and professional life, always giving more than 100% and thus being able to contribute positively to my work, and my autonomous learning.

proyectos.title: Projects
proyectos.info-proyecto1: A game where the user must guess the secret word with a certain number of chances. The word is chosen randomly by the program and the user will lose the moment the gallows is completed.
proyectos.info-proyecto2: My personal web portfolio, where you can find some of my most outstanding projects, my technical skills and a bit about my background.
proyectos.info-proyecto3: An encryptor where the user can type a text and the encryptor encrypts it with pre-programmed keys. The encryptor can also decrypt the text.
